title: Gameplay+ = SJW Circlejerk
body:
Different topics of discussion but similar way of thinking and handling opposition

- if they don't agree with you, you can't post there.

- if you dislike a post, you can't downvote.

They say there are guidelines but it's all really vague, so they just don't accept whatever they don't like. Phew, now there's only topics they like there and no one can downvote them! I already didn't like Gameplay+ but now with the PAX event I know these kind of people have heavily infiltrated Riot.

replies.body: downvotes arent meant to be used for posts that you dislike,but used on posts with low effort such as this one

> [{quoted}](name=UnboundHades,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JFUrkgMQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-09-04T19:41:30.510+0000)
>
> downvotes arent meant to be used for posts that you dislike,but used on posts with low effort such as this one

Just because you don't agree with it doesn't make it low effort. That's exactly the kind of mindset I'm talking about.

This is a minimal effort troll post, go away.

"SJWs" have nothing to do with keeping trolls like yourself from spamming gameplay discussion for attention.
Be careful when posting those comments. I legit posted ''begone tumblr troll'' and the post got removed and I got a warning LMFAO!
I get more shit removed by the poor moderators than i can actually remember.
Imagine being a moderator ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ‘Œ ðŸ‘Œ ðŸ‘Œ ðŸ‘Œ ðŸ‘Œ ðŸ‘Œ ðŸ‘Œ
It was too much for poor Laughing Fish

[CT designs are some of the best designs in this game](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-plus/28nNMfnH-ct-designs-are-some-of-the-best-designs-in-this-game) has a comment with more upvotes than the original post. That comment disagrees with the OP.

It's not what you say, it's how you say it.

Mark my words,  One day Gameplay will be gone and Gameplay+ will all that is left.

They want control the narrative of what the "Community" is talking about.
